description: Join our expert staff as they open the Museum of Croydon stores for an intimate guided tour of our stored collections. This activity will take approximately 1 hour and can cater for a maximum of 8 people.

factsheet.heading: Visit our object store facilities
paragraphs: This is a rare opportunity to see behind-the-scenes of a local history museum with a fascinating collection including the Riesco ceramic assemblage, archaeological, domestic and fine art objects.

factsheet.heading: Curator-led tours
paragraphs: Explore our exhibition with exclusive curator-led expertise with unique insights into the building of 'Art and Joy'

factsheet.heading: Explore archival material
paragraphs: Join our tour of Forge: Industries of Croydon for the rare opportunity to look at archival material around Croydon's fascinating Industrial Heritage.

travel_info: Additional travel info: Our meeting point will be outside the Central Library in the Clocktower. For more information on how to get here: museumofcroydon.com/visit

name: Museum of Croydon Behind the Scenes Tour
